periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Partly sunny, with a high near 91. West wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 8pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 73. Southwest wind 1 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
